tuto.name: Lancer
tuto.title: Lancers
tuto.desc: Lancers are enemies who charge you on sight, spear ahead in order to pierce you before disappearing.

tuto.name: Dragonet
tuto.title: Dragonnets
tuto.desc: Dragonets are identified small flying objects who tends to stay in front of you. This way you can not see the other ennemies. They inflict damages on you with their fire-breath until you kill them. Moreover, they will regularly switch to another position, trying to get around your defense.

tuto.name: Cannon
tuto.title: Cannons
tuto.desc: They are non moving enemies firing cannonball towards you. These projectiles have a parabolic trajectory, hitting you at different places of your body.

tuto.name: Assassin
tuto.title: Assassins
tuto.desc: They peacefully walk around till they are away from your field of view. Then, if you do not have killed them, they will stab you which inflicts a huge amount of damages on you.

tuto.name: Wall
tuto.title: Walls
tuto.desc: They do not attack you as they can not move. However, they protect a canon. You have to destroy the wall in order to fight back the canon.

tuto.name: Fire
tuto.Title: Fire ennemies
tuto.desc: These enemies are stronger than their basic version. They inflict more damages on you so be careful when you fight them.

tuto.name: Ice
tuto.Title: Ice ennemies
tuto.desc: They are the stronger of your enemies. Their attacks are both faster and more powerful than their fire version.

tuto.name: Potion
tuto.Title: Potions
tuto.desc: Life potions (red potion) restore a portion of your health. Power potion (blue potion) restore a part of your power gauge. Invincibility potion (yellow potion) makes you unattainable for a short period of time.

tuto.name: warriorAttackLeap
tuto.title: Warrior's attack
tuto.desc: You are a warrior so you have a sword, a beautiful one. Move your right hand as you were wielding a sword, trying to cut your enemies. Do not try to do a thrusting attack as your hands may not be detected anymore by the Leap Motion, or you could hit your screen.

tuto.name: warriorDefenceLeap
tuto.title: Warrior's defence
tuto.desc: The warrior has got a shield. It follows you left hand movements, so you just need to move your left hand right or left and up or down to place the shield on the path of your enemies’ attacks.

tuto.name: wizardAttackLeap
tuto.title: Wizard's attack
tuto.desc: The wizard can cast fire balls. To do so, you have to proceed in two steps. Start by closing your right fist, palm down. Then open it to free the fireball.

tuto.name: wizardDefenceLeap
tuto.title: Wizard's defence
tuto.desc: To protect himself the wizard can use a mana generated shield that need to be set at desired location. Once placed it is active for 3 seconds and then disappear. However, during this time it is not possible to place another shield. In order to do so, you start by closing your left hand to load the shield. Then you can move it to reach the desired position and finally re-open your hand to place the shield there.

tuto.name: monkAttackLeap
tuto.title: Monk's attack
tuto.desc: With your staff you can hit multiple enemies with only one attack. Move your right hand as you were holding a staff trying to sweep your enemies off.

tuto.name: monkDefenceLeap
tuto.title: Monk's defence
tuto.desc: The monk can not protect himself but is able to meditate. This allows him to rapidly regain health, thanks to his mana. This is done by bringing your hand closer than usual, side by side.

tuto.name: warriorAttackKeyboard
tuto.title: Warrior's attack
tuto.desc: Use the mouse to bring your sword next to the enemy. Then left click will let you swing your sword so you can kill it.

tuto.name: warriorDefenceKeyboard
tuto.title: Warrior's defence
tuto.desc: The Z, Q, S, D keys make your shield move where you need it to ward. It automatically blocks the enemy attack if well placed. You can also press ‘space’ to push it forward and it will come back to its normal place when the key is released.

tuto.name: wizardAttackKeyboard
tuto.title: Wizard's attack
tuto.desc: Move the mouse to place it where you need to cast a fireball. Pushing the left click will load the spell. When releasing the button, the fireball will be cast straight forward.

tuto.name: wizardDefenceKeyboard
tuto.title: Wizard's defence
tuto.desc: The Z, Q, S, D keys help you to place the defence hand where you need to cast your shield. Once at the right location, pushing the ‘space’ key start to load the spell. When released a shield of mana is placed at the current location and is active for 3 seconds. However, during this time it is not possible to place another shield.

tuto.name: monkAttackKeyboard
tuto.title: Monk's attack
tuto.desc: Use your mouse to move your staff. When near one or more enemies press left click to hit them all with your staff.

tuto.name: monkDefenceKeyboard
tuto.title: Monk's defence
tuto.desc: As a monk you can not defend yourself. However, you are able to meditate in order to regain health, using mana. To do so, use your mouse and the Z, Q, S, D to bring closer both hands, side by side.

tuto.name: onPop
tuto.title: First time playing the game
tuto.desc: In Rush The Music you are a hero trying to reach the castle where the princess Khimaira is imprisoned. However, your path is ambushed by numerous enemies and hazards. Will you manage to survive and reach the tower ?

tuto.name: leapMotion
tuto.title: Leap Motion
tuto.desc: The Leap Motion allows you to control the game using your hands. To do so you need to place your hands, palm down, around 15cm above the device. Space your hands about 20 cm to be sure the Leap Motion controller differentiate them. Also avoid going behind the leap, towards your screen.

tuto.name: keyboard
tuto.title: Keyboard + Mouse
tuto.desc: While in game you can pause the game using the key ‘p’. From this menu you will be able to manage your game or to go back to the main menu. When it comes to controlling your character the mouse controls the right hand and the keyboard the left one. To attack use the left click. To defend yourself, the Z, Q, S, D keys allow you to place your shield at the desired location.
